text: Blackie) Take A Good Look is a 1990 children's novel by Jacqueline Wilson. == Plot summary== Mary is a nine-year-old partially sighted girl. She is tired of her lack of freedom due to her impaired eyesight, and one day when her grandmother is asleep Mary sneaks out to get some chocolate, crisps and coke. She is then caught up in a robbery and is kidnapped by two men. She manages to escape and helps the police trap the robbers. == References == Category:1990 British novels Category:1990 children's books Category:British children's novels Category:Novels by Jacqueline Wilson
